1010100001010000 0011100111111110 0 -> sum: 1110001001001110, cout: 0
0101101000101111 0010111010001101 0 -> sum: 1000100010111100, cout: 0
0111011010101101 0101110000000110 1 -> sum: 1101001010110100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
